default.title: Pillow Case
default.description: Now you can cuddle with your loved ones even when they're far away! Perfect for kids at sleepaway camp or a long-distance love, this white, cotton/poly pillowcase comes in a satin-finish and measures 30x20". Pillow not included. Landscape photo recommended.

en_US.title: Pillow Case
en_US.description: Now you can cuddle with your loved ones even when they're far away! Perfect for kids at sleepaway camp or a long-distance love, this white, cotton/poly pillowcase comes in a satin-finish and measures 30x20". Pillow not included. Landscape photo recommended.
